textBox.richText: Oh man, yes, this second installment of this amazing series is covering a WHOLE FREAKING ALBUM. That is how good it is. The song above is the first song on the album, Schizophrenia. It is a fast-tempo’d all-around awesome song. The very difficult and fast piano melody almost feels a bit Asian-themed for me (not that that’s bad), but that’s just me. And then yes, of course, it’s a song about some dude with Schizophrenia. What is this I don’t even. Anyway, after this song comes a huge-large assortment of other awesome songs; none of the songs on this album are of “meh” quality. Other “critics” have said the same thing1. You, my wonderful readers, should definitely go purchase this album (if you’re into this music, that is.) I have already converted one (possibly another. You know who you are) into buying it. I have used my stupendous Powers of Persuasion (and alliteration) to get said person(s) to buy this album. Muhaha. And also I mean like look at that artwork right there; it is so astounding! So simple, so quaint, so perfectly fitting! IT IS ALL GREAT GO BUY IT NOW. HERE IS THEIR WEBSITE: CLICK ON THIS HYPERLINK. So um, yes; I guess that concludes the second installment of “Kevin Listens To…” Join us (me) next time! I have a myriad of music to discuss for the future for you all to enjoy!
